title: inta parAkElanamma
sahitya:
inta parAkElanamma jagadIshvari ika tAmasamu sEyakammA mAyamma


anupallavi

  santatambu ninnE smaraNa jEsina nAdu cintalu dIrpalEva shrI cAmuNDEshvari


caraNam 1    sharaNAgata vatsali nI smaraNammulu jEsina sura varulaku manObhISTa varamu losagalEdA 
niratamu nE bhakti tODa nI kIrtanamulu maravaka bADaga nA manavini vinarAdA
    caraNam 2    munu mahiSAsuruni koraku mummUrtulu ninu moraliDavini vEgamE vAni trnci veta dIrpalEdA 
janapati shrI krSNa rAja jaya ciluni talli nAdu ghana duritammulanu goTTi gAci rakSimpa nI
    caraNam 3    kAla vairi rANi nAdu kaSTamu tolagimpaninta pAlumAli lEka namma patita pAvani 
cAla nammina gOpAladAsuni brOva jAlamu jEsEdavu shrI cAmuNDEshvari
